npcs.name: Old Man
dialog: You've come to try one final time? You know my answer has not changed.
There is nothing for us out there. Only a fool could believe the Shining City exists. Only a fool could believe they could reach it.
They will come for you, you know. In numbers unending. Every time you recharge, they will feel it.
Here, we will fade quietly from this world that we have stolen. It is what we deserve. Out there... I have no pity for you.
